20101211044729.333|20101211044731.000|CCO|VIOLENCE.

20101211044732.429|20101211044733.857|CCO|FIVE PEOPLE HAVE BEEN KILLED.

20101211044735.286|20101211044736.714|CCO|FLUID AND THE U.S. GOVERNMENT

20101211044738.143|20101211044739.571|CCO|ADVISING AMERICANS TO RECONSIDER

20101211044749.571|20101211044751.000|CCO|ALLEGING FRAUD AND HAVE TAKEN TO

20101211044802.667|20101211044804.333|CCO|VICTIMS AND DELIVERY OF
20101211044804.333|20101211044806.000|CCO|SUPPLIES TO CAMP WHERE MILLIONS
